sections.instructions: Choose the correct answer for each from the given options:

questions.question: This is the cavity of gastrula:
This is not a sexually transmitted disease:
The excretory organs of cockroach are:
The given animal excretes:
These are cells of hard bones:
Physical trauma in the vertebrae of human results in:
Anticonvulsant drugs are administered in:
This disease is caused due to deficiency of insulin:
The unit of measurement of noise is:
Lamark's theory does not include this point:
This disease is controlled by genetherapy:
The joint between two consecutive vertebrae in human beings is:
Overproduction of cortisole causes:
This is progressive deterioration of the body:
Struggle for existence among the members of same species is:
Deficiency of Vitamin 'D' causes:
This reproduction avoids genetic monotony:
The non-coding sequence of DNA is:

sections.instructions: Answer 11 questions in all. Select six question from Reasoning questions and five from Non-Reasoning questions.

questions.question: How does Osmoregulation take place in Trout fish?
Why do skeletal muscles show fatigue after heavy exercise?
How does Abnormal development take place in man?
Why is Archaeopteryx considered a link between Reptiles and Birds?
How is Ozone layer being depleted?
Why is DNA fingerprinting performed?
Why are identical twins exactly similar while Fraternal twins are dissimilar?
Why is Nervous co-ordination called the quickest way of communication within the body?
How does pancreas regulate the amount of blood sugar?
What are Vestigial organs? Write their examples.
Write a note on Smooth muscles or Cardiac muscles.
Write a note on Lithotripsy.
Define Receptors. Classify them with examples on the basis of stimuli.
Label the marked parts in the given diagram:
State the significance of Genetically engineered bacteria
What are the three main causes of Skeletal deformities? Give one example of each with symptoms.
Draw labeled diagrams of different stages of Spermatogenesis or Oogenesis.
Explain the Regulatory functions of the human Kidney and draw a labeled diagram of nephron. OR Describe the structure and functions of different parts of the human Brain. (Diagram is not required).
Describe the mechanism of contraction in Skeletal muscle fibre and drew neat and labeled diagram of contraction and relaxation.
Explain the various steps involved in Recombinant DNA technology and draw neat and labeled diagram. OR Describe with the help of labeled diagram the human Female reproductive system.
